User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"质量检测标准"，添加页眉显示"质检部"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "质量检测标准", level=1);add_header(doc_path, "质检部");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"检测项目"、"检测方法"和"质量要求"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "检测项目", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "检测方法", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "质量要求", level=2);

User instruction: 在"检测项目"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "外观检查", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "性能测试", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "可靠性测试", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "安全性测试", style="List Number");

User instruction: 在"质量要求"下插入一个5行3列的表格。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 5, 3);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "检测项目");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "合格标准");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "不合格处理");

User instruction: 添加页码并设置水印"质量标准"。
